Reviews.Title: I feel duped This is not a Canon kit
Reviews.Author: Rated
Reviews.Content: The only things in this Kit that are made by Canon are the camera,charger and lenses. The entire rest of the kit is off brand stuff that is considerably lesser quality. The tripod is useless since it won't lay flat.You can take crooked pics with it I guess but it is not sturdy enough to be trusted with this camera by me.The flash shown in the pic is pretty descent flash.THIS IS NOT THE ONE YOU WILL GET!You will receive the cheapest POS I have ever seen by agfa.Maybe a ten dollar flash and mine has scratches all over it like it was used. I recieved a bottom hot shoe mount that is OBVIOUSLY used due to the stripped threads and teeth marks in the metal.There is also some rust in the threads hole.The camera bag you will recieve will not fit anywhere close to the amount of stuff that is in the kit let alone any extra and is NOT a CANON bag.I really feel duped by this seller and the bait and switch tactic in his ad. I assumed this was a Canon kit since there are no ther MFGs referenced.Do yourself a favor and do some more research on sellers.There are more non Canon items than Canon items in this kit.Unfortunately I need the camera next week so I cannot return the whole darn lot and start over.I ran out today to get a tripod that will work.I can't really afford to replace the bag and flash right now so I am in a bad position.I spent my money on an STM lense to go with camera which is the only way you use the continuous auto focus feature.You cannot use it the way this kit comes.

Reviews.Title: Best camera you ever get for the money
Reviews.Author: Anthony D. Richards "Uncle Gramps"
Reviews.Content: My wife bought this camera set for my birthday and I am using this thing from our boys sporting events to daughters senior graduation and much more. so much great things to say. go get yours now.

Reviews.Title: The kit is not as it looks..
Reviews.Author: juanse
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses are fine, they are Canon.. but the rest of the kit is just crap!!!The tripod broke at the 2nd time I used it, the flash in not Canon so as the car charger..

Reviews.Title: Great transaction.
Reviews.Author: Mike661
Reviews.Content: Good experience with sellerLove the camera & all the goodies that came with it.Highly recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for one

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Avinash Srinivasan
Reviews.Content: Have owned it for over a year now. Works great and was an amazing buy. The price may have dropped now but its worth the buy.

Reviews.Title: canon t3i
Reviews.Author: luis de freitas
Reviews.Content: my best camera... the canon t3i is a camera semi pro that permite practice and make great shots... recommended XD

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i
Reviews.Author: mrmarks66
Reviews.Content: Everything was in the kit as shown, but the small tripod did not. It was a gift for my wife and loves it.

Reviews.Title: OK FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: Roadrunner
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for quality then it isn't necessariy in this package. However it is great for a beginner who may not have the finances to purchase higher end lens and other items. The Tripod is NOT GOOD. It is very flimsy and I will not place my equipment on it. The Tri-Pod will work great on the smaller compact cameras. I have used the various lenses and filters and noticed good results. OK for the price.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i kit
Reviews.Author: Henrique Juliano
Reviews.Content: The service was well done and all the products listed were shipped and received. I am happy with my recent purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle Deal
Reviews.Author: GoldenChyld
Reviews.Content: I searched several websites for the best bundle deal and this was definitely it.  The bundle comes will all the basic necessities.It comes with a lot of extra batteries for the camera as well,

Reviews.Title: one great deal
Reviews.Author: MarioD
Reviews.Content: This was the first DSLR camera I have ever bought and this all in one purchase is everything I will need for years to come.  It arrived on the estimated date and everything was in perfect condition.  This is a fantastic value.

SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slot; 18MP APS-C CMOS Sensor
3.0" Clear View Vari-Angle LCD; 100-6400 ISO
Full HD Movie Mode w/ Manual Exposure
3.7 Frames/Second Continuous Shooting; 63 Zone Dual-Layer Metering / 9-Point AF
Compatible with the full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses.
